description:
Warm merino wool meets soft recycled polyester to create base-layer bliss. Capilene Air Bottoms offer warmth, moisture-wicking superpowers and amazingly quick drying time. Stretchy fabric blend lets you glide down moguls or stride up to the peak with ease, and seamless construction means no chafing, even on dawn-to-dusk missions. Wear with the Capilene® Air Hoody for head-to-toe warmth.

  • Made of a blend of fine-gauge New Zealand merino wool and Capilene® recycled polyester for enhanced warmth balanced with improved wicking, durability and dry time
  • Fabric is soft against skin and stretches to move with the body
  • Seamless 3-D construction eliminates chafe points through the entire garment and has almost no wasted material
  • Elastic waistband is brushed for next-to-skin softness
  • Double layer on front crotch for additional support
name: Patagonia Capilene Air Bottoms - Men's
